author: ronald
msg: First cut at port to apache-2.0. Simple tests are working.
Error handling is still not quite clear in some cases (especially in
conjunction with ap_pcfg_openfile), and random-number generation
still needs to be moved into APR.

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Don't return APR_EOF from ap_read(). EOF is indicated by a APR_SUCCESS

author: manoj
msg: Fix yet another APR bug. This one caused sporadic CGI failures.

author: stoddard
msg: Fix bug setting localaddr and remoteaddr
